resources.string:
Hi, my name is Jasjot Singh. 

I love fish. 

The kind that is alive and swims around in an aquarium or river, or a lake, and definitely the ocean. 
Fun fact is that I have several aquariums and also a river. 

I like developing apps, too. Raw apps. Grilled apps. Smoked apps. Poached apps - not so much. 
And sometimes I even go firebasing. 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch something. 

Once, when I was camping in Canada, and very hungry, I even caught a large android app with my hands. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make your own app. 
You should ask someone else about developing apps, though.
